level.heading: Conversion.
level.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no person shall convert and the Mayor shall not permit the conversion of any housing accommodation or rental unit into a hotel, motel, inn, or other transient residential occupancy unit or accommodation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-10
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-10, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3501.01.

level.heading: Termination of law Termination of Law 6-10
level.text: Section 907 of D.C. Law 6-10, as amended by § 2(d) of D.C. Law 8-48 and § 818 of D.C. Law 11-52, provided that all subchapters of the act, except III and V, shall terminate on December 31, 2000.
